Class TalonFXWrench

java.lang.Object
com.frc5113.library.motors.TalonFXWrench
public class TalonFXWrench extends Object
Basic configuration for TalonFX (Falcon) motors 400W Power @ 40A / 12VDC (20A optimal)

  • Method Details

    • defaultSetup

      public static void defaultSetup(com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.TalonFX motor, boolean isInverted, double currentLimit)
      Performs a (factory) default setup for a TalonFX (commonly used with a Neo500). The script does the following:
      • Set factory defaults
      • Set the feedback device as the integrated sensor
      • Enables and sets the compensation at 12V. Note, this may be a know issue
      • Applies a current limiter at the currentLimit voltage
      • Inverts the motor (if requested)
      • Reduces update rate of unimportant updates to reduce CAN usage. Read more here
      Parameters:
      motor - The motor to configure
      isInverted - Should the motor invert voltage
      currentLimit - Draw current limiter (Amps)

    • configAllSetup

      public static void configAllSetup(com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.TalonFX motor, com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.TalonFXConfiguration config)
      Applies a preconfigured TalonFXConfiguration to a Talon motor. Use for parents.
      Parameters:
      motor - Motor to apply configuration to
      config - (Set up) configuration

    • configFollowerSetup

      public static void configFollowerSetup(com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.TalonFX motor, com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.TalonFXConfiguration config)
      Applies a preconfigured TalonFXConfiguration to a Talon motor. Use for followers.
      Parameters:
      motor - Motor to apply configuration to
      config - (Set up) configuration

    • simpleCurrentLimit

      public static void simpleCurrentLimit(com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.TalonFX motor, double limit)
      Apply a voltage limit to the draw of a Talon
      Parameters:
      motor - Motor to restrict
      limit - Upper limit (volts)

    • defaultStatusFrames

      public static void defaultStatusFrames(com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.TalonFX motor)
      Update the speed of updates to reduce CAN usage to a fast / slow profile. Good for motors with low / no need to update status info (followers)
      Parameters:
      motor - Motor to update speed for

    • pidStatusFrames

      public static void pidStatusFrames(com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.TalonFX motor)
      Update the speed of updates to reduce CAN usage to a fast / medium / slow profile Good for motors with medium need to update status info (parents)
      Parameters:
      motor - Motor to update speed for
